text:
from the marketplace requirements post, is section 2.6 still applicable?
> _2.6_ All menu modules must use the default menu menu tree.
<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/articles/kcs_article/resources/what-are-the-submission-requirements-for-the-template-marketplace>
With custom modules providing url links and such, what if we wanted to do it in a custom module?

If you’re using a menu module OR a menu (not simple menu) field in a module you’ll need to use the `default` menu. The reason being that menus aren’t copied to portals when an asset is purchased in the marketplace. If `default` isn’t selected then the copy will break as it can’t find the menu associated with the menu ID in the destination portal.
